channel.title: How do i remove fire on client background
channel.description: hey guys i wanna remove this:, any ideas?? and one more thing what do you think of the background??

item.title: How do i remove fire on client background
item.dc:creator: @own_master own master
item.description:
@own_master wrote:

[quote=“Loveandpower, post:7, topic:394389”]Renamed clients

after finding that you need to comment this out

public void run() { if(drawFlames) { drawFlames(); } else { super.run(); } }comment this out as well’

replace the above with

public void run() { if(drawFlames) { //drawFlames(); } else { super.run(); } }

In sprite.java find this

uncomment that line and add your images directory
Dimensions are 767x505

[hr]

not renamed clients

Open up, “Client.java” again and search:

And you should see two of them. Like this:

method58(25106); method58(25106);

Just add: // behind both of them, or you can just remove 'em.[/quote]
thanks but how can i decompile a very large class??

Read full topic
item.source: How do i remove fire on client background

item.title: How do i remove fire on client background
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

Renamed clients

after finding that you need to comment this out

public void run() { if(drawFlames) { drawFlames(); } else { super.run(); } }comment this out as well’

replace the above with

public void run() { if(drawFlames) { //drawFlames(); } else { super.run(); } }

In sprite.java find this

uncomment that line and add your images directory
Dimensions are 767x505

[hr]

not renamed clients

Open up, “Client.java” again and search:

And you should see two of them. Like this:

method58(25106); method58(25106);

Just add: // behind both of them, or you can just remove 'em.

Read full topic
